Key:
I was a student at the infirmary where you came
in, Shido.

I think that's a pretty normal setting to be in.
It's not that unusual.
I see. So I was a normal girl.

So you know that you're usually not a normal
girl... Was that the only thing that was different
for you?
...He saw my underwear. I was embarrassed.

...I see. Your being embarrassed over something
is a drastic change on its own. And what exactly
were you doing, Shido...?
No, no, no! It was an accident! It was!
